title: Energy conservation - final speed of ion of mass m

content.question: An ion with charge <math alttext="positive e" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mi>e</mi></mpadded></math> and mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> has an initial speed <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>. The ion accelerates as it moves through a potential difference <math alttext="negative delta V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi></math> . What is the ion’s final speed?

choices.label: <math alttext="positive e times delta V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>+</mo><mi>e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half m times v sub 0, end sub, squared, plus e times delta V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of, the fraction with numerator 2 e times delta V, and denominator m, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac></msqrt></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of, v sub 0, end sub, squared, plus the fraction with numerator 2 e times delta V, and denominator m, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac></msqrt></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of, v sub 0, end sub, squared, plus the fraction with numerator 2 e times delta V, and denominator m, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac></msqrt></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
